最初は右も左も分からずキラーにボコボコにされ、
キラーをやればサバイバーにライトカチカチ屈伸ふんふんされるゲーム！

youtubeなどで勉強して多少の知識が付いてくると一気に楽しくなる！
それもボコボコにされますが、うまくいった時のアドレナリンがやっばい！

基本的にキラー専ですが、
このゲーム、対人だと思うとメンタルが崩壊しちゃうので
自分との闘いだと思うのがコツです！

このゲーム、正解がないのが面白いです！
十人十色、１００人いたら１００人の考え、行動が違うのです。

チェイスが苦手なら隠密したらいいんです。
隠密も苦手なら、救助を頑張ればいいんです。
それも無理なら、効率よく解読しましょう。
自分の得意なもので勝負しよう！
这是一款非对称的竞技游戏，喜欢强大的杀手或者喜欢可爱的偷电小子，都可以让你在这款游戏中找到源源不断的乐趣。目前游戏开发已经趋于完整和平衡，剧情故事，技能多样，操作意识，这里都是你发挥的舞台，对于新手游戏也提供了更大的方便并且降低了难度。现在的Dead by Daylight已经是一款成熟的并且值得入手的好游戏。

The three things that will drive a killer main to insanity...

Liked
- Game can be fun when playing with friends.

Disliked
- Toxicity deeply ingrained in the community.
- Extremely grindy, which doesn't allow for those playing killer to vary their roster. Whereas survivor abilities are universal, thus only requiring you to reach level 40 to use perks of a new survivor, killer abilities are unique, requiring those who play killer to level every new killer to level 50, minimum, in order to potentially secure perks that will allow them to compete in a game if they choose to play the new killer character. There has been no cost reduction, or anything else done in order to facilitate obtaining these perks for older killers. The Shrine of Secrets alleviate some of the issues, but 1. there's only 2 killer perks available, which change weekly, and with a growing roster, good luck getting that perk you want or need. And, 2. It does not solve the issue if you're interested in playing the newest killer, you're still required to level up and hope that the perks you want will show up; if they don't, you will have to make the choice of "wasting" your bloodpoints currency and rolling until you obtain your perks, or prestiging and starting again from level 1.

Gioco molto bello e interessante, è difficile che stanchi per via del fatto che vengono aggiunti sempre nuovi killer, survivor e perk con regolarità e per quanto riguarda i bug non sono cosi tanti soprattutto se facciamo un confronto di com'era il gioco qualche anno fa, le partite, con gli aggiornamenti del matchmaking, sono abbastanza bilanciate (anche se il sistema di matchmaking è ancora in test), inoltre è un gioco che si distingue dalla massa. Le cose che mi hanno fatto storcere il naso principalmente sono 2: le code un po lunghe in certe fasce orarie (anche se parlaimo di una attesa di MASSIMO 5 minuti, però come ho detto avviene solo in certi orari in cui i player sono un po di meno) e la communty molto tossica. Tutto sommato è un ottimo titolo se cercate un gioco diverso dalla merda commerciale che gira adesso

Die meiste Zeit spiele ich als Killer, jedoch macht das mittlerweile keinen Spaß mehr. Durch die fehlende Balance zwischen Killer und Überlebenden habe ich sehr viele Runden in denen ich einen oder auch keinen Kill bekomme. Zudem ist nur ungefähr die hälfte der Killer wirklich spielbar, der Rest ist so schwach, dass eine Runde ohne Frustration nicht möglich ist. Ein besserer Name wäre "Mobbing für 4", denn Killer zu Spielen ist absolut unbefriedigend.

I am a 45 yo father, probably one of the oldest people playing this game. I am a single father to my Son, who is 14 now. My son got this game for Christmas in 2021 from his uncle, so we installed it on his computer and he started playing. By the end of the week he had 24 hours on this game. This was horrible for me, as it was already hard for me to find ways to spend time with my son, as he is always out with his friends or just watching YouTube. So i decided to make a Steam account and get this game to see if I could maybe play alongside him. I loaded into the game, picked my character and world and started playing but I was stuck on what you where supposed to do. I asked my Son for help and he hosted a game for me to join. I loved it as it was the best time I had spent with my Son since my wife had died. This game has ever since brought me and my son closer again and now we actually spend time together outside the house together as well. This game reminded me that there's fun to be had in everything, and it has brought both me and my Son many happy memories.
MMR system that doesn't represent skill at all. And is only designed to get new players into the game, and making purchases in a false sense of the MMR system actually working.

I have played this game for over a 1000 hrs now. I only play survivor, because the first few times I tried playing killer I was bullied and made fun of for not being good ; I didn't feel like repeating the experience.

As a survivor, I don't mind "losing" a game, in the sense that if I die I don't care, as long as the game was fun. What I mean by fun is good chases and a killer who doesn't only target one player over and over, or camp the hooks or the basement without doing anything else.

What's really annoying to me is that my having fun is dependant on how the killer I get feels like acting. If that killer feels like being an a***ole? Well he's gonna camp and tunnel survivors to oblivion. There's only so much you can do with limited perks and there essentially won't be a game. Especially if you're playing by yourself with random other players.

One of the killers, The Trickster, has a perk that makes the survivors exposed for staying in his terror radius too long. Why isn't a mechanic like this in place for killers who camp and/or tunnel? Like some sort of penalty? Because unfortunately, for every killer that plays fair, you get 5 who don't. 

This is my main issue with this game, I won't even get into the hit boxes problem. I keep coming back to it because the base principle of it is awesome but I always end up having to take a looooong break before coming back because I just get frustrated with it.

Jeżeli grasz z dwoma lub trzema kolegami, to ta recenzja nie ma sensu.

W grze "bawiłem" się przez 200h, niestety nie rzadko była to udręka powodowana przez graczy, po równo, zabójców jak i przetrwańców. Problemy z dobieraniem do rozgrywek mam rozumieć małą popularnością gry? Czy co? Po rzekomej poprawie tego mankamentu, pojawiają się sami ruscy... więc już wiadomo o co chodzi, nie spotkałem jeszcze nikogo, komu chce się grać z ruskimi. Gra sama w sobie nie jest zła, sam nie spotkałem się z żadnymi błędami, ale poziom community jest tragiczny. Gwóźdź do trumny przybijają twórcy, którzy wzmacniają zabójców, nie dając nic przetrwańcom i nie było by to tak dotkliwe, gdyby nie strasznie niski poziom graczy, kij z tym jeżeli również zabójca jest słaby, ale jeżeli jest mocny, to jest mega trudno, bo grając we dwóch albo co gorsza samemu, reszta graczy będzie miała cię w głębokim poważaniu, a sami nie dotrwają do końca ze względu na ich brak, BRAK, NULL, KURWA IDIOCI PIERDOLENI, umiejętności grania.
